title: Rajeshwari Ruby & Diamond Collar Necklace - Jadau Kundan Inspired Haaram
materials: Natural Ruby Cabochons. Meticulously crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This exquisite necklace features a delicate collar design inspired by traditional Jadau Kundan craftsmanship. The floral motifs are intricately set with dazzling brilliant-cut diamonds, creating a breathtaking sparkle. The piece is anchored by two striking ruby cabochons in a floral design, adding a touch of regal elegance and traditional South Indian charm. The back chain is made of a mesh design.
occasions: or high-end festive occasions. Makes a stunning statement piece for contemporary evening wear or a special anniversary.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional Telugu jewelry artistry and contemporary design sensibilities. The stunning Ruby and Diamond combination symbolizes prosperity and enduring love, making it a meaningful heirloom piece. The brilliant diamonds ensure an unforgettable sparkle, while the rich gold provides a timeless look. The craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting value. A true 'Varalakshmi Vratam' worthy piece.
